Text:
I cant make it work on internal disk.
I get 'Error reading disc'
That's right it doesn't work. @consolasatope after updating the game without JB get its backup again then it'll work.

OK i find the solution.

You need to download this patch:

EP4001-BLES00256_00-GRIDPTCHSCEE0103-A0103-V0100.pkg

Install it from Install Packages with a usb stick and you are good to go :)
